title: Hand Written like type from Bon Appetit Magazine
author: jgalano

comments.content:
From what I can gather, Bon Appetit commissions calligraphic headlines for some of its spreads. If you can find the actual magazine, you may find a credit for the artist.

S0me fonts that approximate the look:  
Candombe and Pronto by Sudtipos, [http://sudtipos.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317181023/http:/sudtipos.com/ "http://sudtipos.com")

4 different /o + 2 different /l = hand-drawn  
Alternatives: [Olicana](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317181023/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/g-type/olicana), [Pastiche Brush](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317181023/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/schizotype/pastiche-brush), [Despeinada](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317181023/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/edy-type/despeinada), [Imitation](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317181023/http:/haroldsfonts.com/portfolio/imitation), [Manus](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317181023/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/joebob/manus) (and many more JOEBOB graphics fonts actually like Hannes, Casual...), [Cheddar Jack](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317181023/http:/www.dafont.com/cheddar-jack.font), [Wild Pen](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317181023/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/corradine/wild-pen)
